19struct vec2
20{
21 union
22 {
23 struct
24 {
25 float x, y;
26 };
27 float v[2];
28 };

30 vec2() {}
31 vec2(float x, float y) : x(x), y(y) {}
32 explicit vec2(const vec &v);
33 explicit vec2(const vec4<float> &v);
34
35 float &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
36 float operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
37
38 bool operator==(const vec2 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y; }
39 bool operator!=(const vec2 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y; }
40
41 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0; }
42 float dot(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
43 float squaredlen() const { return dot(*this); }
44 float magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
45 vec2 &normalize() { mul(1/magnitude()); return *this; }
46 vec2 &safenormalize() { float m = magnitude(); if(m) mul(1/m); return *this; }
47 float cross(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.y - y*o.x; }
48 float squaredist(const vec2 &e) const { return vec2(*this).sub(e).squaredlen(); }
49 float dist(const vec2 &e) const { return sqrtf(squaredist(e)); }
50
51 vec2 &mul(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; return *this; }
52 vec2 &mul(const vec2 &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; return *this; }
53 vec2 &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
54 vec2 &div(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; return *this; }
55 vec2 &div(const vec2 &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; return *this; }
56 vec2 &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; return *this; }
57 vec2 &add(float f) { x += f; y += f; return *this; }
58 vec2 &add(const vec2 &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; return *this; }
59 vec2 &sub(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; return *this; }
60 vec2 &sub(const vec2 &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; return *this; }
61 vec2 &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; }
62 vec2 &min(const vec2 &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); return *this; }
63 vec2 &max(const vec2 &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); return *this; }
64 vec2 &min(float f) { x = ::min(x, f); y = ::min(y, f); return *this; }
65 vec2 &max(float f) { x = ::max(x, f); y = ::max(y, f); return *this; }
66 vec2 &abs() { x = fabs(x); y = fabs(y); return *this; }
67 vec2 &clamp(float l, float h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); return *this; }
68 vec2 &reflect(const vec2 &n) { float k = 2*dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; return *this; }
69 vec2 &lerp(const vec2 &b, float t) { x += (b.x-x)*t; y += (b.y-y)*t; return *this; }
70 vec2 &lerp(const vec2 &a, const vec2 &b, float t) { x = a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t; y = a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t; return *this; }
71 vec2 &avg(const vec2 &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }

74 {
75 return vec2(x+v2.x, y+v2.y);

85 return vec2(-x, -y);

116 vec2 &rotate_around_z(float c, float s) { float rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
117 vec2 &rotate_around_z(float angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
118 vec2 &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }

121inline bool htcmp(const vec2 &x, const vec2 &y)
122{
123 return x == y;
124}
125
126inline uint hthash(const vec2 &k)
127{
128 union
129 {
130 uint i;
131 float f;
132 } x, y;
133 x.f = k.x;
134 y.f = k.y;
135 uint v = x.i^y.i;
136 return v + (v>>12);
137}

148struct vec
149{
150 union
151 {
152 struct
153 {
154 float x, y, z;
155 };
156 struct
157 {
158 float r, g, b;
159 };
160 float v[3];
161 };

166 vec(float a, float b, float c) : x(a), y(b), z(c) {}

174 vec(float yaw, float pitch) : x(-std::sin(yaw)*cosf(pitch)), y(cosf(yaw)*cosf(pitch)), z(std::sin(pitch)) {}
175 vec &set(int i, float f) { v[i] = f; return *this; }

221 //unary operators
222 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
223 float squaredlen() const { return x*x + y*y + z*z; }
224 vec &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
225 vec &neg2() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; } //unused
226 vec &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; } //overloaded by operator-()
227 vec &abs() { x = fabs(x); y = fabs(y); z = fabs(z); return *this; }
228 vec &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; z = 1/z; return *this; } //used twice
229 float magnitude2() const { return sqrtf(dot2(*this)); }
230 float magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
231 vec &normalize() { div(magnitude()); return *this; }
232 vec &safenormalize() { float m = magnitude(); if(m) div(m); return *this; }
233 bool isnormalized() const { float m = squaredlen(); return (m>0.99f && m<1.01f); }
234
235 //elementwise float operators
236 vec &mul(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this; }
237 vec &mul2(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; return *this; } //unused
238 vec &div(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; z /= f; return *this; }
239 vec &div2(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; return *this; } //unused
240 vec &add(float f) { x += f; y += f; z += f; return *this; }
241 vec &add2(float f) { x += f; y += f; return *this; } //used once
242 vec &addz(float f) { z += f; return *this; } //unused
243 vec &sub(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; z -= f; return *this; }
244 vec &sub2(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; return *this; } //unused
245 vec &subz(float f) { z -= f; return *this; } //unused
246 vec &min(float f) { x = ::min(x, f); y = ::min(y, f); z = ::min(z, f); return *this; }
247 vec &max(float f) { x = ::max(x, f); y = ::max(y, f); z = ::max(z, f); return *this; }
248 vec &clamp(float l, float h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); return *this; }

250 //elementwise vector operators
251 vec &mul(const vec &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; return *this; }
252 vec &div(const vec &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; return *this; }
253 vec &add(const vec &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; return *this; }
254 vec &sub(const vec &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; return *this; }
255 vec &min(const vec &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); z = ::min(z, o.z); return *this; }
256 vec &max(const vec &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); z = ::max(z, o.z); return *this; }
257
258 //dot products
259 float dot2(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
260 float dot2(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
261 float dot(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
262 float squaredot(const vec &o) const { float k = dot(o); return k*k; } //unused
263 float absdot(const vec &o) const { return fabs(x*o.x) + fabs(y*o.y) + fabs(z*o.z); } //used once
264 float zdot(const vec &o) const { return z*o.z; } //unused
265
266 //distances
267 float squaredist(const vec &e) const { return vec(*this).sub(e).squaredlen(); }
268 float dist(const vec &e) const { return sqrtf(squaredist(e)); }
269 float dist(const vec &e, vec &t) const { t = *this; t.sub(e); return t.magnitude(); }
270 float dist2(const vec &o) const { float dx = x-o.x, dy = y-o.y; return sqrtf(dx*dx + dy*dy); }
271
272 //cross products
273 template<class T>
274 bool reject(const T &o, float r) { return x>o.x+r || x<o.x-r || y>o.y+r || y<o.y-r; }
275
276 template<class A, class B>
277 vec &cross(const A &a, const B &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
278
279 vec &cross(const vec &o, const vec &a, const vec &b) { return cross(vec(a).sub(o), vec(b).sub(o)); }
280
284 float scalartriple(const vec &a, const vec &b) const { return x*(a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y) + y*(a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z) + z*(a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x); }
285 float zscalartriple(const vec &a, const vec &b) const { return z*(a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x); } //unused
286
287 //transformations
288 vec &reflectz(float rz) { z = 2*rz - z; return *this; }
289 vec &reflect(const vec &n) { float k = 2*dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; z -= k*n.z; return *this; }
290 vec &project(const vec &n) { float k = dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; z -= k*n.z; return *this; }
291 vec &projectxydir(const vec &n) { if(n.z) z = -(x*n.x/n.z + y*n.y/n.z); return *this; } //used once
292 vec &projectxy(const vec &n)
293 {
294 float m = squaredlen(), k = dot(n);
295 projectxydir(n);
296 rescale(sqrtf(::max(m - k*k, 0.0f)));
297 return *this;
298 } //used once
299 vec &projectxy(const vec &n, float threshold)
300 {
301 float m = squaredlen(), k = ::min(dot(n), threshold);
302 projectxydir(n);
303 rescale(sqrtf(::max(m - k*k, 0.0f)));
304 return *this;
305 } //used once
306 vec &lerp(const vec &b, float t) { x += (b.x-x)*t; y += (b.y-y)*t; z += (b.z-z)*t; return *this; }
307 vec &lerp(const vec &a, const vec &b, float t) { x = a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t; y = a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t; z = a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t; return *this; }
308 vec &avg(const vec &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }

310 template<class B>
311 vec &madd(const vec &a, const B &b) { return add(vec(a).mul(b)); }
312
313 template<class B>
314 vec &msub(const vec &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec(a).mul(b)); }
315
316 vec &rescale(float k)
317 {
318 float mag = magnitude();
319 if(mag > 1e-6f) mul(k / mag);
320 return *this;
321 }
322
323 vec &rotate_around_z(float c, float s) { float rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
324 vec &rotate_around_x(float c, float s) { float ry = y, rz = z; y = c*ry-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*ry; return *this; }
325 vec &rotate_around_y(float c, float s) { float rx = x, rz = z; x = c*rx+s*rz; z = c*rz-s*rx; return *this; }
326
327 vec &rotate_around_z(float angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
328 vec &rotate_around_x(float angle) { return rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
329 vec &rotate_around_y(float angle) { return rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
330
331 vec &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
332 vec &rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
333 vec &rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
334
335 vec &rotate(float c, float s, const vec &d)
336 {
337 *this = vec(x*(d.x*d.x*(1-c)+c) + y*(d.x*d.y*(1-c)-d.z*s) + z*(d.x*d.z*(1-c)+d.y*s),
338 x*(d.y*d.x*(1-c)+d.z*s) + y*(d.y*d.y*(1-c)+c) + z*(d.y*d.z*(1-c)-d.x*s),
339 x*(d.x*d.z*(1-c)-d.y*s) + y*(d.y*d.z*(1-c)+d.x*s) + z*(d.z*d.z*(1-c)+c));
340 return *this;
341 }
342 vec &rotate(float angle, const vec &d) { return rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), d); }
343 vec &rotate(const vec2 &sc, const vec &d) { return rotate(sc.x, sc.y, d); }
344
345 void orthogonal(const vec &d)
346 {
347 *this = fabs(d.x) > fabs(d.z) ? vec(-d.y, d.x, 0) : vec(0, -d.z, d.y);
348 }
349
350 void orthonormalize(vec &s, vec &t) const
351 {
352 s.project(*this);
353 t.project(*this).project(s);
354 } //unused
355
356 template<class T>
357 bool insidebb(const T &bbmin, const T &bbmax) const
358 {
359 return x >= bbmin.x && x <= bbmax.x && y >= bbmin.y && y <= bbmax.y && z >= bbmin.z && z <= bbmax.z;
360 }
361
362 template<class T, class U>
363 bool insidebb(const T &bbmin, const T &bbmax, U margin) const
364 {
365 return x >= bbmin.x-margin && x <= bbmax.x+margin && y >= bbmin.y-margin && y <= bbmax.y+margin && z >= bbmin.z-margin && z <= bbmax.z+margin;
366 }
367
368 template<class T, class U>
369 bool insidebb(const T &o, U size) const
370 {
371 return x >= o.x && x <= o.x + size && y >= o.y && y <= o.y + size && z >= o.z && z <= o.z + size;
372 }
373
374 template<class T, class U>
375 bool insidebb(const T &o, U size, U margin) const
376 {
377 size += margin;
378 return x >= o.x-margin && x <= o.x + size && y >= o.y-margin && y <= o.y + size && z >= o.z-margin && z <= o.z + size;
379 }
380
381 template<class T>
382 float dist_to_bb(const T &min, const T &max) const
383 {
384 float sqrdist = 0;
385 for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
386 {
387 if (v[i] < min[i])
388 {
389 float delta = v[i]-min[i];
390 sqrdist += delta*delta;
391 }
392 else if(v[i] > max[i])
393 {
394 float delta = max[i]-v[i];
395 sqrdist += delta*delta;
396 }
397 }
398 return sqrtf(sqrdist);
399 }
400
401 template<class T, class S>
402 float dist_to_bb(const T &o, S size) const
403 {
404 return dist_to_bb(o, T(o).add(size));
405 }
406
407 template<class T>
408 float project_bb(const T &min, const T &max) const
409 {
410 return x*(x < 0 ? max.x : min.x) + y*(y < 0 ? max.y : min.y) + z*(z < 0 ? max.z : min.z);
411 }
412
413 static vec hexcolor(int color)
414 {
415 return vec(((color>>16)&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f), ((color>>8)&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f), (color&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f));
416 }
417
418 int tohexcolor() const
419 {
420 return (static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(r, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255)<<16) |
421 (static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(g, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255)<<8) |
422 static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(b, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255);
423 }
424};
425
426inline vec2::vec2(const vec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
427
428inline bool htcmp(const vec &x, const vec &y)
429{
430 return x == y;
431}
432
433inline uint hthash(const vec &k)
434{
435 union { uint i; float f; } x, y, z;
436 x.f = k.x;
437 y.f = k.y;
438 z.f = k.z;
439 uint v = x.i^y.i^z.i;
440 return v + (v>>12);
441}
442
443
447struct bvec
448{
449 union
450 {
451 struct
452 {
453 uchar x, y, z;
454 };
455 struct
456 {
457 uchar r, g, b;
458 };
459 uchar v[3];
460 };
461
462 bvec() {}
463 bvec(uchar x, uchar y, uchar z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
464 explicit bvec(const vec &v) : x(static_cast<uchar>((v.x+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))), y(static_cast<uchar>((v.y+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))), z(static_cast<uchar>((v.z+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))) {}
465 explicit bvec(const vec4<uchar> &v);
466
467 uchar &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
468 uchar operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
469
470 bool operator==(const bvec &v) const { return x==v.x && y==v.y && z==v.z; }
471 bool operator!=(const bvec &v) const { return x!=v.x || y!=v.y || z!=v.z; }
472
473 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
474
475 vec tonormal() const { return vec(x*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, y*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, z*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f); }
476
477 bvec &normalize()
478 {
479 vec n(x-127.5f, y-127.5f, z-127.5f);
480 float mag = 127.5f/n.magnitude();
481 x = static_cast<uchar>(n.x*mag+127.5f);
482 y = static_cast<uchar>(n.y*mag+127.5f);
483 z = static_cast<uchar>(n.z*mag+127.5f);
484 return *this;
485 }
486
487 void lerp(const bvec &a, const bvec &b, float t)
488 {
489 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t);
490 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t);
491 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t);
492 }
493
494 void lerp(const bvec &a, const bvec &b, int ka, int kb, int d)
495 {
496 x = static_cast<uchar>((a.x*ka + b.x*kb)/d);
497 y = static_cast<uchar>((a.y*ka + b.y*kb)/d);
498 z = static_cast<uchar>((a.z*ka + b.z*kb)/d);
499 }
500
501 void flip()
502 {
503 x ^= 0x80;
504 y ^= 0x80;
505 z ^= 0x80;
506 }
507
508 void scale(int k, int d)
509 {
510 x = static_cast<uchar>((x*k)/d);
511 y = static_cast<uchar>((y*k)/d);
512 z = static_cast<uchar>((z*k)/d);
513 }
514
515 bvec &shl(int n)
516 {
517 x <<= n;
518 y <<= n;
519 z <<= n;
520 return *this;
521 }
522 bvec &shr(int n)
523 {
524 x >>= n;
525 y >>= n;
526 z >>= n;
527 return *this;
528 }
529
530 static bvec fromcolor(const vec &v)
531 {
532 return bvec(static_cast<uchar>(v.x*255.0f), static_cast<uchar>(v.y*255.0f), static_cast<uchar>(v.z*255.0f));
533 }
534
535 vec tocolor() const
536 {
537 return vec(x*(1.0f/255.0f), y*(1.0f/255.0f), z*(1.0f/255.0f));
538 }
539
540 static bvec from565(ushort c)
541 {
542 return bvec((((c>>11)&0x1F)*527 + 15) >> 6, (((c>>5)&0x3F)*259 + 35) >> 6, ((c&0x1F)*527 + 15) >> 6);
543 }
544
545 static bvec hexcolor(int color)
546 {
547 return bvec((color>>16)&0xFF, (color>>8)&0xFF, color&0xFF);
548 }
549
550 int tohexcolor() const
551 {
552 return (static_cast<int>(r)<<16)|(static_cast<int>(g)<<8)|static_cast<int>(b);
553 }
554};
555
560template<typename T>
561struct vec4
562{
563 union
564 {
565 struct { T x, y, z, w; };
566 struct { T r, g, b, a; };
567 T v[4];
568 uint mask;
569 };
570
571 vec4() {}
572 explicit vec4(const vec &p, T w = 0) : x(p.x), y(p.y), z(p.z), w(w) {}
573 explicit vec4(const vec2 &p, T z = 0, T w = 0) : x(p.x), y(p.y), z(z), w(w) {}
574 vec4(T x, T y, T z, T w) : x(x), y(y), z(z), w(w) {}
575 vec4(bvec v, uchar c)
576 {
577 x = v.x;
578 y = v.y;
579 z = v.z;
580 w = c;
581 }
582 vec4(bvec v)
583 {
584 x = v.x;
585 y = v.y;
586 z = v.z;
587 w = 0;
588 }
589
590 explicit vec4(const T *v) : x(v[0]), y(v[1]), z(v[2]), w(v[3]) {}
591
592 template<class U>
593 operator vec4<U>()
594 {
595 return vec4<U>(static_cast<U>(this->x),
596 static_cast<U>(this->y),
597 static_cast<U>(this->z),
598 static_cast<U>(this->w));
599 }
600
601 T &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
602 T operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
603
604 bool operator==(const vec4 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y && z == o.z && w == o.w; }
605 bool operator!=(const vec4 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y || z != o.z || w != o.w; }
606
607 T dot3(const vec4 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
608 T dot3(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
609 T dot(const vec4 &o) const { return dot3(o) + w*o.w; }
610 T dot(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z + w; }
611 T squaredlen() const { return dot(*this); }
612 T magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
613 T magnitude3() const { return sqrtf(dot3(*this)); }
614 vec4 &normalize() { mul(1/magnitude()); return *this; }
615 vec4 &safenormalize() { T m = magnitude(); if(m) mul(1/m); return *this; }
616
617 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, float t)
618 {
619 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t);
620 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t);
621 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t);
622 w = a.w;
623 }
624
625 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, int ka, int kb, int d)
626 {
627 x = static_cast<uchar>((a.x*ka + b.x*kb)/d);
628 y = static_cast<uchar>((a.y*ka + b.y*kb)/d);
629 z = static_cast<uchar>((a.z*ka + b.z*kb)/d);
630 w = a.w;
631 }
632
633 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, const vec4<uchar> &c, float ta, float tb, float tc)
634 {
635 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x*ta + b.x*tb + c.x*tc);
636 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y*ta + b.y*tb + c.y*tc);
637 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z*ta + b.z*tb + c.z*tc);
638 w = static_cast<uchar>(a.w*ta + b.w*tb + c.w*tc);
639 }
640
641 void flip() { mask ^= 0x80808080; }
642
643 vec4 &lerp(const vec4 &b, T t)
644 {
645 x += (b.x-x)*t;
646 y += (b.y-y)*t;
647 z += (b.z-z)*t;
648 w += (b.w-w)*t;
649 return *this;
650 }
651 vec4 &lerp(const vec4 &a, const vec4 &b, T t)
652 {
653 x = a.x+(b.x-a.x)*t;
654 y = a.y+(b.y-a.y)*t;
655 z = a.z+(b.z-a.z)*t;
656 w = a.w+(b.w-a.w)*t;
657 return *this;
658 }
659 vec4 &avg(const vec4 &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
660
661 template<class B>
662 vec4 &madd(const vec4 &a, const B &b) { return add(vec4(a).mul(b)); }
663
664 template<class B>
665 vec4 &msub(const vec4 &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec4(a).mul(b)); }
666
677 vec4 &mul3(T f) { x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this; }
678
689 vec4 &mul(T f) { mul3(f); w *= f; return *this; }
690
702 vec4 &mul(const vec4 &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; w *= o.w; return *this; }
703
715 vec4 &mul(const vec &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; return *this; }
716
725 vec4 &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
726 vec4 &div3(T f) { x /= f; y /= f; z /= f; return *this; }
727 vec4 &div(T f) { div3(f); w /= f; return *this; }
728 vec4 &div(const vec4 &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; w /= o.w; return *this; }
729 vec4 &div(const vec &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; return *this; }
730 vec4 &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; z = 1/z; w = 1/w; return *this; }
731 vec4 &add(const vec4 &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; w += o.w; return *this; }
732 vec4 &add(const vec &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; return *this; }
733 vec4 &add3(T f) { x += f; y += f; z += f; return *this; }
734 vec4 &add(T f) { add3(f); w += f; return *this; }
735 vec4 &addw(T f) { w += f; return *this; }
736 vec4 &sub(const vec4 &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; w -= o.w; return *this; }
737 vec4 &sub(const vec &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; return *this; }
738 vec4 &sub3(T f) { x -= f; y -= f; z -= f; return *this; }
739 vec4 &sub(T f) { sub3(f); w -= f; return *this; }
740 vec4 &subw(T f) { w -= f; return *this; }
741 vec4 &neg3() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; }
742 vec4 &neg() { neg3(); w = -w; return *this; }
743 vec4 &clamp(T l, T h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); w = ::std::clamp(w, l, h); return *this; }
744
745
746 vec4 operator+(const vec4 &v2)
747 {
748 return vec4(x+v2.x, y+v2.y, z+v2.z, w+v2.w);
749 }
750
751 vec4 operator-(const vec4 &v2)
752 {
753 return vec4(x-v2.x, y-v2.y, z-v2.z, w+v2.w);
754 }
755
756 vec4 operator-()
757 {
758 return vec4(-x, -y, -z, -w);
759 }
760
761 template<typename U>
762 vec4 operator*(const U &n)
763 {
764 return vec4(n*x, n*y, n*z, n*w);
765 }
766
767 vec4 operator*(const vec4 &v2)
768 {
769 return vec4(x*v2.x, y*v2.y, z*v2.z, w*v2.w);
770 }
771
772 template<typename U>
773 vec4 operator/(const U &n)
774 {
775 return vec4(x/n, y/n, z/n, w/n);
776 }
777
778 vec4 operator/(const vec4 &v2)
779 {
780 return vec4(x/v2.x, y/v2.y, z/v2.z, w/v2.w);
781 }
782
783
784 template<class A, class B>
785 vec4 &cross(const A &a, const B &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
786
787 vec4 &cross(const vec &o, const vec &a, const vec &b) { return cross(vec(a).sub(o), vec(b).sub(o)); }
788
789 void setxyz(const vec &v) { x = v.x; y = v.y; z = v.z; }
790
791 vec4 &rotate_around_z(T c, T s) { T rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
792 vec4 &rotate_around_x(T c, T s) { T ry = y, rz = z; y = c*ry-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*ry; return *this; }
793 vec4 &rotate_around_y(T c, T s) { T rx = x, rz = z; x = c*rx-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*rx; return *this; }
794
795 vec4 &rotate_around_z(T angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
796 vec4 &rotate_around_x(T angle) { return rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
797 vec4 &rotate_around_y(T angle) { return rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
798
799 vec4 &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
800 vec4 &rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
801 vec4 &rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
802
803 vec tonormal() const { return vec(x*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, y*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, z*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f); }
804
805};
806inline vec2::vec2(const vec4<float> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
807inline vec::vec(const vec4<float> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
808
809struct matrix3;
810struct matrix4x3;
811struct matrix4;
812
818struct quat : vec4<float>
819{
820 quat() {}
821 quat(float x, float y, float z, float w) : vec4<float>(x, y, z, w) {}
822 quat(const vec &axis, float angle)
823 {
824 w = cosf(angle/2);
825 float s = std::sin(angle/2);
826 x = s*axis.x;
827 y = s*axis.y;
828 z = s*axis.z;
829 }
830 quat(const vec &u, const vec &v)
831 {
832 w = sqrtf(u.squaredlen() * v.squaredlen()) + u.dot(v);
833 cross(u, v);
834 normalize();
835 }
836 explicit quat(const vec &v)
837 {
838 x = v.x;
839 y = v.y;
840 z = v.z;
841 restorew();
842 }
843 explicit quat(const matrix3 &m) { convertmatrix(m); }
844 explicit quat(const matrix4x3 &m) { convertmatrix(m); }
845 explicit quat(const matrix4 &m) { convertmatrix(m); }
846
847 void restorew() { w = 1.0f-x*x-y*y-z*z; w = w<0 ? 0 : -sqrtf(w); }
848
849 quat &add(const vec4<float> &o) { vec4<float>::add(o); return *this; }
850 quat &sub(const vec4<float> &o) { vec4<float>::sub(o); return *this; }
851 quat &mul(float k) { vec4<float>::mul(k); return *this; }
852 template<class B>
853 quat &madd(const vec4<float> &a, const B &b) { return add(vec4<float>(a).mul(b)); }
854
855 template<class B>
856 quat &msub(const vec4<float> &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec4<float>(a).mul(b)); }
857
858 quat &mul(const quat &p, const quat &o)
859 {
860 x = p.w*o.x + p.x*o.w + p.y*o.z - p.z*o.y;
861 y = p.w*o.y - p.x*o.z + p.y*o.w + p.z*o.x;
862 z = p.w*o.z + p.x*o.y - p.y*o.x + p.z*o.w;
863 w = p.w*o.w - p.x*o.x - p.y*o.y - p.z*o.z;
864 return *this;
865 }
866 quat &mul(const quat &o) { return mul(quat(*this), o); }
867
868 quat &invert() { neg3(); return *this; }
869
870 quat &normalize() { vec4<float>::normalize(); return *this; }
871
872 void calcangleaxis(float &angle, vec &axis) const
873 {
874 float rr = dot3(*this);
875 if(rr>0)
876 {
877 angle = 2*acosf(w);
878 axis = vec(x, y, z).mul(1/rr);
879 }
880 else { angle = 0; axis = vec(0, 0, 1); }
881 }
882
883 vec calcangles() const
884 {
885 vec4<float> qq = vec4<float>(*this).square();
886 float rr = qq.x + qq.y + qq.z + qq.w,
887 t = x*y + z*w;
888 if(fabs(t) > 0.49999f*rr)
889 {
890 return t < 0 ? vec(-2*atan2f(x, w), -M_PI/2, 0) : vec(2*atan2f(x, w), M_PI/2, 0);
891 }
892 return vec(atan2f(2*(y*w - x*z), qq.x - qq.y - qq.z + qq.w),
893 asinf(2*t/rr),
894 atan2f(2*(x*w - y*z), -qq.x + qq.y - qq.z + qq.w));
895 }
896
897 vec rotate(const vec &v) const
898 {
899 return vec().cross(*this, vec().cross(*this, v).madd(v, w)).mul(2).add(v);
900 }
901
902 vec invertedrotate(const vec &v) const
903 {
904 return vec().cross(*this, vec().cross(*this, v).msub(v, w)).mul(2).add(v);
905 }
906
907 template<class M>
908 void convertmatrix(const M &m)
909 {
910 float trace = m.a.x + m.b.y + m.c.z;
911 if(trace>0)
912 {
913 float r = sqrtf(1 + trace), inv = 0.5f/r;
914 w = 0.5f*r;
915 x = (m.b.z - m.c.y)*inv;
916 y = (m.c.x - m.a.z)*inv;
917 z = (m.a.y - m.b.x)*inv;
918 }
919 else if(m.a.x > m.b.y && m.a.x > m.c.z)
920 {
921 float r = sqrtf(1 + m.a.x - m.b.y - m.c.z), inv = 0.5f/r;
922 x = 0.5f*r;
923 y = (m.a.y + m.b.x)*inv;
924 z = (m.c.x + m.a.z)*inv;
925 w = (m.b.z - m.c.y)*inv;
926 }
927 else if(m.b.y > m.c.z)
928 {
929 float r = sqrtf(1 + m.b.y - m.a.x - m.c.z), inv = 0.5f/r;
930 x = (m.a.y + m.b.x)*inv;
931 y = 0.5f*r;
932 z = (m.b.z + m.c.y)*inv;
933 w = (m.c.x - m.a.z)*inv;
934 }
935 else
936 {
937 float r = sqrtf(1 + m.c.z - m.a.x - m.b.y), inv = 0.5f/r;
938 x = (m.c.x + m.a.z)*inv;
939 y = (m.b.z + m.c.y)*inv;
940 z = 0.5f*r;
941 w = (m.a.y - m.b.x)*inv;
942 }
943 }
944};
945
952struct dualquat
953{
954 quat real, dual;
955
956 dualquat() {}
957 dualquat(const quat &q, const vec &p)
958 : real(q),
959 dual(0.5f*( p.x*q.w + p.y*q.z - p.z*q.y),
960 0.5f*(-p.x*q.z + p.y*q.w + p.z*q.x),
961 0.5f*( p.x*q.y - p.y*q.x + p.z*q.w),
962 -0.5f*( p.x*q.x + p.y*q.y + p.z*q.z))
963 {
964 }
965 explicit dualquat(const quat &q) : real(q), dual(0, 0, 0, 0) {}
966 explicit dualquat(const matrix4x3 &m);
967
968 dualquat &mul(float k) { real.mul(k); dual.mul(k); return *this; }
969 dualquat &add(const dualquat &d) { real.add(d.real); dual.add(d.dual); return *this; }
970
971 dualquat &lerp(const dualquat &to, float t)
972 {
973 float k = real.dot(to.real) < 0 ? -t : t;
974 real.mul(1-t).madd(to.real, k);
975 dual.mul(1-t).madd(to.dual, k);
976 return *this;
977 }
978 dualquat &lerp(const dualquat &from, const dualquat &to, float t)
979 {
980 float k = from.real.dot(to.real) < 0 ? -t : t;
981 (real = from.real).mul(1-t).madd(to.real, k);
982 (dual = from.dual).mul(1-t).madd(to.dual, k);
983 return *this;
984 }
985
986 dualquat &invert()
987 {
988 real.invert();
989 dual.invert();
990 dual.msub(real, 2*real.dot(dual));
991 return *this;
992 }
993
994 void mul(const dualquat &p, const dualquat &o)
995 {
996 real.mul(p.real, o.real);
997 dual.mul(p.real, o.dual).add(quat().mul(p.dual, o.real));
998 }
999 void mul(const dualquat &o) { mul(dualquat(*this), o); }
1000
1001 void mulorient(const quat &q)
1002 {
1003 real.mul(q, quat(real));
1004 dual.mul(quat(q).invert(), quat(dual));
1005 }
1006
1007 void mulorient(const quat &q, const dualquat &base)
1008 {
1009 quat trans;
1010 trans.mul(base.dual, quat(base.real).invert());
1011 dual.mul(quat(q).invert(), quat().mul(real, trans).add(dual));
1012
1013 real.mul(q, quat(real));
1014 dual.add(quat().mul(real, trans.invert())).msub(real, 2*base.real.dot(base.dual));
1015 }
1016
1017 void normalize()
1018 {
1019 float invlen = 1/real.magnitude();
1020 real.mul(invlen);
1021 dual.mul(invlen);
1022 }
1023
1024 void translate(const vec &p)
1025 {
1026 dual.x += 0.5f*( p.x*real.w + p.y*real.z - p.z*real.y);
1027 dual.y += 0.5f*(-p.x*real.z + p.y*real.w + p.z*real.x);
1028 dual.z += 0.5f*( p.x*real.y - p.y*real.x + p.z*real.w);
1029 dual.w += -0.5f*( p.x*real.x + p.y*real.y + p.z*real.z);
1030 }
1031
1032 void scale(float k)
1033 {
1034 dual.mul(k);
1035 }
1036
1037 void fixantipodal(const dualquat &d)
1038 {
1039 if(real.dot(d.real) < 0)
1040 {
1041 real.neg();
1042 dual.neg();
1043 }
1044 }
1045
1046 void accumulate(const dualquat &d, float k)
1047 {
1048 if(real.dot(d.real) < 0)
1049 {
1050 k = -k;
1051 }
1052 real.madd(d.real, k);
1053 dual.madd(d.dual, k);
1054 }
1055
1056 vec transform(const vec &v) const
1057 {
1058 return vec().cross(real, vec().cross(real, v).madd(v, real.w).add(vec(dual))).madd(vec(dual), real.w).msub(vec(real), dual.w).mul(2).add(v);
1059 }
1060
1061 quat transform(const quat &q) const
1062 {
1063 return quat().mul(real, q);
1064 }
1065
1066 vec transposedtransform(const vec &v) const
1067 {
1068 return dualquat(*this).invert().transform(v);
1069 }
1070
1071 vec transformnormal(const vec &v) const
1072 {
1073 return real.rotate(v);
1074 }
1075
1076 vec transposedtransformnormal(const vec &v) const
1077 {
1078 return real.invertedrotate(v);
1079 }
1080
1081 vec gettranslation() const
1082 {
1083 return vec().cross(real, dual).madd(vec(dual), real.w).msub(vec(real), dual.w).mul(2);
1084 }
1085};
1086
1097struct matrix3
1098{
1099 vec a, b, c;
1100
1101 matrix3() {}
1102 matrix3(const vec &a, const vec &b, const vec &c) : a(a), b(b), c(c) {}
1103 explicit matrix3(float angle, const vec &axis) { rotate(angle, axis); }
1104 explicit matrix3(const quat &q)
1105 {
1106 float x = q.x, y = q.y, z = q.z, w = q.w,
1107 tx = 2*x, ty = 2*y, tz = 2*z,
1108 txx = tx*x, tyy = ty*y, tzz = tz*z,
1109 txy = tx*y, txz = tx*z, tyz = ty*z,
1110 twx = w*tx, twy = w*ty, twz = w*tz;
1111 a = vec(1 - (tyy + tzz), txy + twz, txz - twy);
1112 b = vec(txy - twz, 1 - (txx + tzz), tyz + twx);
1113 c = vec(txz + twy, tyz - twx, 1 - (txx + tyy));
1114 }
1115 explicit matrix3(const matrix4x3 &m);
1116 explicit matrix3(const matrix4 &m);
1117
1118 void mul(const matrix3 &m, const matrix3 &n)
1119 {
1120 a = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.x).madd(m.b, n.a.y).madd(m.c, n.a.z);
1121 b = vec(m.a).mul(n.b.x).madd(m.b, n.b.y).madd(m.c, n.b.z);
1122 c = vec(m.a).mul(n.c.x).madd(m.b, n.c.y).madd(m.c, n.c.z);
1123 }
1124 void mul(const matrix3 &n) { mul(matrix3(*this), n); }
1125
1126 void multranspose(const matrix3 &m, const matrix3 &n)
1127 {
1128 a = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.x).madd(m.b, n.b.x).madd(m.c, n.c.x);
1129 b = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.y).madd(m.b, m.b.y).madd(m.c, n.c.y);
1130 c = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.z).madd(m.b, n.b.z).madd(m.c, n.c.z);
1131 }
1132 void multranspose(const matrix3 &n) { multranspose(matrix3(*this), n); }
1133
1134 void transposemul(const matrix3 &m, const matrix3 &n)
1135 {
1136 a = vec(m.a.dot(n.a), m.b.dot(n.a), m.c.dot(n.a));
1137 b = vec(m.a.dot(n.b), m.b.dot(n.b), m.c.dot(n.b));
1138 c = vec(m.a.dot(n.c), m.b.dot(n.c), m.c.dot(n.c));
1139 }
1140 void transposemul(const matrix3 &n) { transposemul(matrix3(*this), n); }
1141
1142 void transpose()
1143 {
1144 swap(a.y, b.x); swap(a.z, c.x);
1145 swap(b.z, c.y);
1146 }
1147
1148 template<class M>
1149 void transpose(const M &m)
1150 {
1151 a = vec(m.a.x, m.b.x, m.c.x);
1152 b = vec(m.a.y, m.b.y, m.c.y);
1153 c = vec(m.a.z, m.b.z, m.c.z);
1154 }
1155
1156 void invert(const matrix3 &o)
1157 {
1158 vec unscale(1/o.a.squaredlen(), 1/o.b.squaredlen(), 1/o.c.squaredlen());
1159 transpose(o);
1160 a.mul(unscale);
1161 b.mul(unscale);
1162 c.mul(unscale);
1163 }
1164 void invert() { invert(matrix3(*this)); }
1165
1166 void normalize()
1167 {
1168 a.normalize();
1169 b.normalize();
1170 c.normalize();
1171 }
1172
1173 void scale(float k)
1174 {
1175 a.mul(k);
1176 b.mul(k);
1177 c.mul(k);
1178 }
1179
1180 void rotate(float angle, const vec &axis)
1181 {
1182 rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), axis);
1183 }
1184
1185 void rotate(float ck, float sk, const vec &axis)
1186 {
1187 a = vec(axis.x*axis.x*(1-ck)+ck, axis.x*axis.y*(1-ck)+axis.z*sk, axis.x*axis.z*(1-ck)-axis.y*sk);
1188 b = vec(axis.x*axis.y*(1-ck)-axis.z*sk, axis.y*axis.y*(1-ck)+ck, axis.y*axis.z*(1-ck)+axis.x*sk);
1189 c = vec(axis.x*axis.z*(1-ck)+axis.y*sk, axis.y*axis.z*(1-ck)-axis.x*sk, axis.z*axis.z*(1-ck)+ck);
1190 }
1191
1192 void setyaw(float ck, float sk)
1193 {
1194 a = vec(ck, sk, 0);
1195 b = vec(-sk, ck, 0);
1196 c = vec(0, 0, 1);
1197 }
1198
1199 void setyaw(float angle)
1200 {
1201 setyaw(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle));
1202 }
1203
1204 float trace() const { return a.x + b.y + c.z; }
1205
1206 bool calcangleaxis(float tr, float &angle, vec &axis, float threshold = 1e-16f) const
1207 {
1208 if(tr <= -1)
1209 {
1210 if(a.x >= b.y && a.x >= c.z)
1211 {
1212 float r = 1 + a.x - b.y - c.z;
1213 if(r <= threshold)
1214 {
1215 return false;
1216 }
1217 r = sqrtf(r);
1218 axis.x = 0.5f*r;
1219 axis.y = b.x/r;
1220 axis.z = c.x/r;
1221 }
1222 else if(b.y >= c.z)
1223 {
1224 float r = 1 + b.y - a.x - c.z;
1225 if(r <= threshold)
1226 {
1227 return false;
1228 }
1229 r = sqrtf(r);
1230 axis.y = 0.5f*r;
1231 axis.x = b.x/r;
1232 axis.z = c.y/r;
1233 }
1234 else
1235 {
1236 float r = 1 + b.y - a.x - c.z;
1237 if(r <= threshold)
1238 {
1239 return false;
1240 }
1241 r = sqrtf(r);
1242 axis.z = 0.5f*r;
1243 axis.x = c.x/r;
1244 axis.y = c.y/r;
1245 }
1246 angle = M_PI;
1247 }
1248 else if(tr >= 3)
1249 {
1250 axis = vec(0, 0, 1);
1251 angle = 0;
1252 }
1253 else
1254 {
1255 axis = vec(b.z - c.y, c.x - a.z, a.y - b.x);
1256 float r = axis.squaredlen();
1257 if(r <= threshold)
1258 {
1259 return false;
1260 }
1261 axis.mul(1/sqrtf(r));
1262 angle = acosf(0.5f*(tr - 1));
1263 }
1264 return true;
1265 }
1266
1267 bool calcangleaxis(float &angle, vec &axis, float threshold = 1e-16f) const { return calcangleaxis(trace(), angle, axis, threshold); }
1268
1269 vec transform(const vec &o) const
1270 {
1271 return vec(a).mul(o.x).madd(b, o.y).madd(c, o.z);
1272 }
1273 vec transposedtransform(const vec &o) const { return vec(a.dot(o), b.dot(o), c.dot(o)); }
1274 vec abstransform(const vec &o) const
1275 {
1276 return vec(a).mul(o.x).abs().add(vec(b).mul(o.y).abs()).add(vec(c).mul(o.z).abs());
1277 }
1278 vec abstransposedtransform(const vec &o) const
1279 {
1280 return vec(a.absdot(o), b.absdot(o), c.absdot(o));
1281 }
1282
1283 void identity()
1284 {
1285 a = vec(1, 0, 0);
1286 b = vec(0, 1, 0);
1287 c = vec(0, 0, 1);
1288 }
1289
1290 void rotate_around_x(float ck, float sk)
1291 {
1292 vec rb = vec(b).mul(ck).madd(c, sk),
1293 rc = vec(c).mul(ck).msub(b, sk);
1294 b = rb;
1295 c = rc;
1296 }
1297 void rotate_around_x(float angle) { rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1298 void rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
1299
1300 void rotate_around_y(float ck, float sk)
1301 {
1302 vec rc = vec(c).mul(ck).madd(a, sk),
1303 ra = vec(a).mul(ck).msub(c, sk);
1304 c = rc;
1305 a = ra;
1306 }
1307 void rotate_around_y(float angle) { rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1308 void rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
1309
1310 void rotate_around_z(float ck, float sk)
1311 {
1312 vec ra = vec(a).mul(ck).madd(b, sk),
1313 rb = vec(b).mul(ck).msub(a, sk);
1314 a = ra;
1315 b = rb;
1316 }
1317 void rotate_around_z(float angle) { rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1318 void rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
1319
1320 vec transform(const vec2 &o) { return vec(a).mul(o.x).madd(b, o.y); }
1321 vec transposedtransform(const vec2 &o) const { return vec(a.dot2(o), b.dot2(o), c.dot2(o)); }
1322
1323 vec rowx() const { return vec(a.x, b.x, c.x); }
1324 vec rowy() const { return vec(a.y, b.y, c.y); }
1325 vec rowz() const { return vec(a.z, b.z, c.z); }
1326};
1327
1338struct matrix4x3
1339{
1340 vec a, b, c, d;
1341
1342 matrix4x3() {}
1343 matrix4x3(const vec &a, const vec &b, const vec &c, const vec &d) : a(a), b(b), c(c), d(d) {}
1344 matrix4x3(const matrix3 &rot, const vec &trans) : a(rot.a), b(rot.b), c(rot.c), d(trans) {}
1345 matrix4x3(const dualquat &dq)
1346 {
1347 vec4<float> r = vec4<float>(dq.real).mul(1/dq.real.squaredlen()), rr = vec4<float>(r).mul(dq.real);
1348 r.mul(2);
1349 float xy = r.x*dq.real.y, xz = r.x*dq.real.z, yz = r.y*dq.real.z,
1350 wx = r.w*dq.real.x, wy = r.w*dq.real.y, wz = r.w*dq.real.z;
1351 a = vec(rr.w + rr.x - rr.y - rr.z, xy + wz, xz - wy);
1352 b = vec(xy - wz, rr.w + rr.y - rr.x - rr.z, yz + wx);
1353 c = vec(xz + wy, yz - wx, rr.w + rr.z - rr.x - rr.y);
1354 d = vec(-(dq.dual.w*r.x - dq.dual.x*r.w + dq.dual.y*r.z - dq.dual.z*r.y),
1355 -(dq.dual.w*r.y - dq.dual.x*r.z - dq.dual.y*r.w + dq.dual.z*r.x),
1356 -(dq.dual.w*r.z + dq.dual.x*r.y - dq.dual.y*r.x - dq.dual.z*r.w));
1357
1358 }
1359 explicit matrix4x3(const matrix4 &m);
1360
1361 void mul(float k)
1362 {
1363 a.mul(k);
1364 b.mul(k);
1365 c.mul(k);
1366 d.mul(k);
1367 }
1368
1369 void setscale(float x, float y, float z)
1370 {
1371 a.x = x;
1372 b.y = y;
1373 c.z = z;
1374 }
1375
1376 void setscale(const vec &v)
1377 {
1378 setscale(v.x, v.y, v.z);
1379 }
1380
1381 void setscale(float n)
1382 {
1383 setscale(n, n, n);
1384 }
1385
1386 void scale(float x, float y, float z)
1387 {
1388 a.mul(x);
1389 b.mul(y);
1390 c.mul(z);
1391 }
1392
1393 void scale(const vec &v)
1394 {
1395 scale(v.x, v.y, v.z);
1396 }
1397
1398 void scale(float n)
1399 {
1400 scale(n, n, n);
1401 }
1402
1403 void settranslation(const vec &p)
1404 {
1405 d = p;
1406 }
1407
1408 void settranslation(float x, float y, float z)
1409 {
1410 d = vec(x, y, z);
1411 }
1412
1413 void translate(const vec &p)
1414 {
1415 d.madd(a, p.x).madd(b, p.y).madd(c, p.z);
1416 }
1417
1418 void translate(float x, float y, float z)
1419 {
1420 translate(vec(x, y, z));
1421 }
1422
1423 void translate(const vec &p, float scale)
1424 {
1425 translate(vec(p).mul(scale)); }
1426
1427 void accumulate(const matrix4x3 &m, float k)
1428 {
1429 a.madd(m.a, k);
1430 b.madd(m.b, k);
1431 c.madd(m.c, k);
1432 d.madd(m.d, k);
1433 }
1434
1435 void normalize()
1436 {
1437 a.normalize();
1438 b.normalize();
1439 c.normalize();
1440 }
1441
1442 void lerp(const matrix4x3 &to, float t)
1443 {
1444 a.lerp(to.a, t);
1445 b.lerp(to.b, t);
1446 c.lerp(to.c, t);
1447 d.lerp(to.d, t);
1448 }
1449 void lerp(const matrix4x3 &from, const matrix4x3 &to, float t)
1450 {
1451 a.lerp(from.a, to.a, t);
1452 b.lerp(from.b, to.b, t);
1453 c.lerp(from.c, to.c, t);
1454 d.lerp(from.d, to.d, t);
1455 }
1456
1457 void identity()
1458 {
1459 a = vec(1, 0, 0);
1460 b = vec(0, 1, 0);
1461 c = vec(0, 0, 1);
1462 d = vec(0, 0, 0);
1463 }
1464
1465 void mul(const matrix4x3 &m, const matrix4x3 &n)
1466 {
1467 a = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.x).madd(m.b, n.a.y).madd(m.c, n.a.z);
1468 b = vec(m.a).mul(n.b.x).madd(m.b, n.b.y).madd(m.c, n.b.z);
1469 c = vec(m.a).mul(n.c.x).madd(m.b, n.c.y).madd(m.c, n.c.z);
1470 d = vec(m.d).madd(m.a, n.d.x).madd(m.b, n.d.y).madd(m.c, n.d.z);
1471 }
1472 void mul(const matrix4x3 &n) { mul(matrix4x3(*this), n); }
1473
1474 void mul(const matrix3 &m, const matrix4x3 &n)
1475 {
1476 a = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.x).madd(m.b, n.a.y).madd(m.c, n.a.z);
1477 b = vec(m.a).mul(n.b.x).madd(m.b, n.b.y).madd(m.c, n.b.z);
1478 c = vec(m.a).mul(n.c.x).madd(m.b, n.c.y).madd(m.c, n.c.z);
1479 d = vec(m.a).mul(n.d.x).madd(m.b, n.d.y).madd(m.c, n.d.z);
1480 }
1481
1482 void mul(const matrix3 &rot, const vec &trans, const matrix4x3 &n)
1483 {
1484 mul(rot, n);
1485 d.add(trans);
1486 }
1487
1488 void transpose()
1489 {
1490 d = vec(a.dot(d), b.dot(d), c.dot(d)).neg();
1491 swap(a.y, b.x); swap(a.z, c.x);
1492 swap(b.z, c.y);
1493 }
1494
1495 void transpose(const matrix4x3 &o)
1496 {
1497 a = vec(o.a.x, o.b.x, o.c.x);
1498 b = vec(o.a.y, o.b.y, o.c.y);
1499 c = vec(o.a.z, o.b.z, o.c.z);
1500 d = vec(o.a.dot(o.d), o.b.dot(o.d), o.c.dot(o.d)).neg();
1501 }
1502
1503 void transposemul(const matrix4x3 &m, const matrix4x3 &n)
1504 {
1505 vec t(m.a.dot(m.d), m.b.dot(m.d), m.c.dot(m.d));
1506 a = vec(m.a.dot(n.a), m.b.dot(n.a), m.c.dot(n.a));
1507 b = vec(m.a.dot(n.b), m.b.dot(n.b), m.c.dot(n.b));
1508 c = vec(m.a.dot(n.c), m.b.dot(n.c), m.c.dot(n.c));
1509 d = vec(m.a.dot(n.d), m.b.dot(n.d), m.c.dot(n.d)).sub(t);
1510 }
1511
1512 void multranspose(const matrix4x3 &m, const matrix4x3 &n)
1513 {
1514 vec t(n.a.dot(n.d), n.b.dot(n.d), n.c.dot(n.d));
1515 a = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.x).madd(m.b, n.b.x).madd(m.c, n.c.x);
1516 b = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.y).madd(m.b, m.b.y).madd(m.c, n.c.y);
1517 c = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.z).madd(m.b, n.b.z).madd(m.c, n.c.z);
1518 d = vec(m.d).msub(m.a, t.x).msub(m.b, t.y).msub(m.c, t.z);
1519 }
1520
1521 void invert(const matrix4x3 &o)
1522 {
1523 vec unscale(1/o.a.squaredlen(), 1/o.b.squaredlen(), 1/o.c.squaredlen());
1524 transpose(o);
1525 a.mul(unscale);
1526 b.mul(unscale);
1527 c.mul(unscale);
1528 d.mul(unscale);
1529 }
1530 void invert() { invert(matrix4x3(*this)); }
1531
1532 void rotate(float angle, const vec &d)
1533 {
1534 rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), d);
1535 }
1536
1537 void rotate(float ck, float sk, const vec &axis)
1538 {
1539 matrix3 m;
1540 m.rotate(ck, sk, axis);
1541 *this = matrix4x3(m, vec(0, 0, 0));
1542 }
1543
1544 void rotate_around_x(float ck, float sk)
1545 {
1546 vec rb = vec(b).mul(ck).madd(c, sk),
1547 rc = vec(c).mul(ck).msub(b, sk);
1548 b = rb;
1549 c = rc;
1550 }
1551 void rotate_around_x(float angle)
1552 {
1553 rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle));
1554 }
1555
1556 void rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc)
1557 {
1558 rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y);
1559 }
1560
1561 void rotate_around_y(float ck, float sk)
1562 {
1563 vec rc = vec(c).mul(ck).madd(a, sk),
1564 ra = vec(a).mul(ck).msub(c, sk);
1565 c = rc;
1566 a = ra;
1567 }
1568 void rotate_around_y(float angle)
1569 {
1570 rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle));
1571 }
1572
1573 void rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc)
1574 {
1575 rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y);
1576 }
1577
1578 void rotate_around_z(float ck, float sk)
1579 {
1580 vec ra = vec(a).mul(ck).madd(b, sk),
1581 rb = vec(b).mul(ck).msub(a, sk);
1582 a = ra;
1583 b = rb;
1584 }
1585 void rotate_around_z(float angle) { rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1586 void rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
1587
1588 vec transform(const vec &o) const { return vec(d).madd(a, o.x).madd(b, o.y).madd(c, o.z); }
1589 vec transposedtransform(const vec &o) const { vec p = vec(o).sub(d); return vec(a.dot(p), b.dot(p), c.dot(p)); }
1590 vec transformnormal(const vec &o) const { return vec(a).mul(o.x).madd(b, o.y).madd(c, o.z); }
1591 vec transposedtransformnormal(const vec &o) const { return vec(a.dot(o), b.dot(o), c.dot(o)); }
1592 vec transform(const vec2 &o) const { return vec(d).madd(a, o.x).madd(b, o.y); }
1593
1594 vec4<float> rowx() const { return vec4<float>(a.x, b.x, c.x, d.x); }
1595 vec4<float> rowy() const { return vec4<float>(a.y, b.y, c.y, d.y); }
1596 vec4<float> rowz() const { return vec4<float>(a.z, b.z, c.z, d.z); }
1597};
1598
1599inline dualquat::dualquat(const matrix4x3 &m) : real(m)
1600{
1601 dual.x = 0.5f*( m.d.x*real.w + m.d.y*real.z - m.d.z*real.y);
1602 dual.y = 0.5f*(-m.d.x*real.z + m.d.y*real.w + m.d.z*real.x);
1603 dual.z = 0.5f*( m.d.x*real.y - m.d.y*real.x + m.d.z*real.w);
1604 dual.w = -0.5f*( m.d.x*real.x + m.d.y*real.y + m.d.z*real.z);
1605}
1606
1607inline matrix3::matrix3(const matrix4x3 &m) : a(m.a), b(m.b), c(m.c) {}
1608
1609struct plane : vec
1610{
1611 float offset;
1612
1613 float dist(const vec &p) const { return dot(p)+offset; }
1614 float dist(const vec4<float> &p) const { return p.dot3(*this) + p.w*offset; }
1615 bool operator==(const plane &p) const { return x==p.x && y==p.y && z==p.z && offset==p.offset; }
1616 bool operator!=(const plane &p) const { return x!=p.x || y!=p.y || z!=p.z || offset!=p.offset; }
1617
1618 plane() {}
1619 plane(const vec &c, float off) : vec(c), offset(off) {}
1620 plane(const vec4<float> &p) : vec(p), offset(p.w) {}
1621 plane(int d, float off)
1622 {
1623 x = y = z = 0.0f;
1624 v[d] = 1.0f;
1625 offset = -off;
1626 }
1627 plane(float a, float b, float c, float d) : vec(a, b, c), offset(d) {}
1628
1629 void toplane(const vec &n, const vec &p)
1630 {
1631 x = n.x;
1632 y = n.y;
1633 z = n.z;
1634 offset = -dot(p);
1635 }
1636
1637 bool toplane(const vec &a, const vec &b, const vec &c)
1638 {
1639 cross(vec(b).sub(a), vec(c).sub(a));
1640 float mag = magnitude();
1641 if(!mag)
1642 {
1643 return false;
1644 }
1645 div(mag);
1646 offset = -dot(a);
1647 return true;
1648 }
1649
1650 bool rayintersect(const vec &o, const vec &ray, float &dist)
1651 {
1652 float cosalpha = dot(ray);
1653 if(cosalpha==0)
1654 {
1655 return false;
1656 }
1657 float deltac = offset+dot(o);
1658 dist -= deltac/cosalpha;
1659 return true;
1660 }
1661
1662 plane &reflectz(float rz)
1663 {
1664 offset += 2*rz*z;
1665 z = -z;
1666 return *this;
1667 }
1668
1669 plane &invert()
1670 {
1671 neg();
1672 offset = -offset;
1673 return *this;
1674 }
1675
1676 plane &scale(float k)
1677 {
1678 mul(k);
1679 return *this;
1680 }
1681
1682 plane &translate(const vec &p)
1683 {
1684 offset += dot(p);
1685 return *this;
1686 }
1687
1688 plane &normalize()
1689 {
1690 float mag = magnitude();
1691 div(mag);
1692 offset /= mag;
1693 return *this;
1694 }
1695
1696 float zintersect(const vec &p) const
1697 {
1698 return -(x*p.x+y*p.y+offset)/z;
1699 }
1700
1701 float zdelta(const vec &p) const
1702 {
1703 return -(x*p.x+y*p.y)/z;
1704 }
1705
1706 float zdist(const vec &p) const
1707 {
1708 return p.z-zintersect(p);
1709 }
1710};
1711
1712struct triangle
1713{
1714 vec a, b, c;
1715
1716 triangle(const vec &a, const vec &b, const vec &c) : a(a), b(b), c(c) {}
1717 triangle() {}
1718
1719 triangle &add(const vec &o)
1720 {
1721 a.add(o);
1722 b.add(o);
1723 c.add(o);
1724 return *this;
1725 }
1726
1727 triangle &sub(const vec &o)
1728 {
1729 a.sub(o);
1730 b.sub(o);
1731 c.sub(o);
1732 return *this;
1733 }
1734
1735 bool operator==(const triangle &t) const
1736 {
1737 return a == t.a && b == t.b && c == t.c;
1738 }
1739};
1740
1741/*
1742
1743The engine uses 3 different linear coordinate systems
1744which are oriented around each of the axis dimensions.
1745
1746So any point within the game can be defined by four coordinates: (d, x, y, z)
1747
1748d is the reference axis dimension
1749x is the coordinate of the ROW dimension
1750y is the coordinate of the COL dimension
1751z is the coordinate of the reference dimension (DEPTH)
1752
1753typically, if d is not used, then it is implicitly the Z dimension.
1754ie: d=z => x=x, y=y, z=z
1755
1756*/
1757
1758// DIM: X=0 Y=1 Z=2.
1759const int R[3] = {1, 2, 0};
1760const int C[3] = {2, 0, 1};
1761const int D[3] = {0, 1, 2};
1763struct ivec2;
1764
1765//integer vector3
1766struct ivec
1767{
1768 union
1769 {
1770 struct
1771 {
1772 int x, y, z;
1773 };
1774 struct
1775 {
1776 int r, g, b;
1777 };
1778 int v[3];
1779 };
1780
1781 ivec() {}
1782 explicit ivec(const vec &v) : x(static_cast<int>(v.x)), y(static_cast<int>(v.y)), z(static_cast<int>(v.z)) {}
1783 ivec(int a, int b, int c) : x(a), y(b), z(c) {}
1784 ivec(int d, int row, int col, int depth)
1785 {
1786 v[R[d]] = row;
1787 v[C[d]] = col;
1788 v[D[d]] = depth;
1789 }
1790 ivec(int i, const ivec &co, int size) : x(co.x+((i&1)>>0)*size), y(co.y+((i&2)>>1)*size), z(co.z +((i&4)>>2)*size) {}
1791 explicit ivec(const ivec2 &v, int z = 0);
1792 explicit ivec(const svec &v);
1793
1794 int &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1795 int operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1796
1797 //int idx(int i) { return v[i]; }
1798 bool operator==(const ivec &v) const { return x==v.x && y==v.y && z==v.z; }
1799 bool operator!=(const ivec &v) const { return x!=v.x || y!=v.y || z!=v.z; }
1800 ivec operator+(const ivec &v) const { return ivec(x+v.x, y+v.y, z+v.z); }
1801 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
1802 ivec &shl(int n) { x<<= n; y<<= n; z<<= n; return *this; }
1803 ivec &shr(int n) { x>>= n; y>>= n; z>>= n; return *this; }
1804 ivec &mul(int n) { x *= n; y *= n; z *= n; return *this; }
1805 ivec &div(int n) { x /= n; y /= n; z /= n; return *this; }
1806 ivec &add(int n) { x += n; y += n; z += n; return *this; }
1807 ivec &sub(int n) { x -= n; y -= n; z -= n; return *this; }
1808 ivec &mul(const ivec &v) { x *= v.x; y *= v.y; z *= v.z; return *this; }
1809 ivec &div(const ivec &v) { x /= v.x; y /= v.y; z /= v.z; return *this; }
1810 ivec &add(const ivec &v) { x += v.x; y += v.y; z += v.z; return *this; }
1811 ivec &sub(const ivec &v) { x -= v.x; y -= v.y; z -= v.z; return *this; }
1812 ivec &mask(int n) { x &= n; y &= n; z &= n; return *this; }
1813 ivec &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; }
1814 ivec &min(const ivec &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); z = ::min(z, o.z); return *this; }
1815 ivec &max(const ivec &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); z = ::max(z, o.z); return *this; }
1816 ivec &min(int n) { x = ::min(x, n); y = ::min(y, n); z = ::min(z, n); return *this; }
1817 ivec &max(int n) { x = ::max(x, n); y = ::max(y, n); z = ::max(z, n); return *this; }
1818 ivec &abs() { x = ::abs(x); y = ::abs(y); z = ::abs(z); return *this; }
1819 ivec &clamp(int l, int h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); return *this; }
1820 ivec &cross(const ivec &a, const ivec &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
1821 int dot(const ivec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
1822 float dist(const plane &p) const { return x*p.x + y*p.y + z*p.z + p.offset; }
1823
1824 static inline ivec floor(const vec &o) { return ivec(static_cast<int>(::floor(o.x)), static_cast<int>(::floor(o.y)), static_cast<int>(::floor(o.z))); }
1825 static inline ivec ceil(const vec &o) { return ivec(static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.x)), static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.y)), static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.z))); }
1826};
1827
1828inline vec::vec(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
1829
1830inline bool htcmp(const ivec &x, const ivec &y)
1831{
1832 return x == y;
1833}
1834
1835inline uint hthash(const ivec &k)
1836{
1837 return k.x^k.y^k.z;
1838}

1843struct ivec2
1844{
1845 union
1846 {
1847 struct { int x, y; };
1848 int v[2];
1849 };
1850
1851 ivec2() {}
1852 ivec2(int x, int y) : x(x), y(y) {}
1853 explicit ivec2(const vec2 &v) : x(static_cast<int>(v.x)), y(static_cast<int>(v.y)) {}
1854 explicit ivec2(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
1855
1856 int &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1857 int operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1858
1859 bool operator==(const ivec2 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y; }
1860 bool operator!=(const ivec2 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y; }
1861
1862 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0; }
1863 ivec2 &shl(int n) { x<<= n; y<<= n; return *this; }
1864 ivec2 &shr(int n) { x>>= n; y>>= n; return *this; }
1865 ivec2 &mul(int n) { x *= n; y *= n; return *this; }
1866 ivec2 &div(int n) { x /= n; y /= n; return *this; }
1867 ivec2 &add(int n) { x += n; y += n; return *this; }
1868 ivec2 &sub(int n) { x -= n; y -= n; return *this; }
1869 ivec2 &mul(const ivec2 &v) { x *= v.x; y *= v.y; return *this; }
1870 ivec2 &div(const ivec2 &v) { x /= v.x; y /= v.y; return *this; }
1871 ivec2 &add(const ivec2 &v) { x += v.x; y += v.y; return *this; }
1872 ivec2 &sub(const ivec2 &v) { x -= v.x; y -= v.y; return *this; }
1873 ivec2 &mask(int n) { x &= n; y &= n; return *this; }
1874 ivec2 &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; }
1875 ivec2 &min(const ivec2 &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); return *this; }
1876 ivec2 &max(const ivec2 &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); return *this; }
1877 ivec2 &min(int n) { x = ::min(x, n); y = ::min(y, n); return *this; }
1878 ivec2 &max(int n) { x = ::max(x, n); y = ::max(y, n); return *this; }
1879 ivec2 &abs() { x = ::abs(x); y = ::abs(y); return *this; }
1880 int dot(const ivec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
1881 int cross(const ivec2 &o) const { return x*o.y - y*o.x; }
1882};
1883

1889}

1894}

1923struct matrix4
1924{
1925 vec4<float> a, b, c, d;
1926
1927 matrix4() {}
1928 matrix4(const float *m) : a(m), b(m+4), c(m+8), d(m+12) {}
1929 matrix4(const vec &a, const vec &b, const vec &c = vec(0, 0, 1))
1930 : a(a.x, b.x, c.x, 0), b(a.y, b.y, c.y, 0), c(a.z, b.z, c.z, 0), d(0, 0, 0, 1)
1931 {}
1932 matrix4(const vec4<float> &a, const vec4<float> &b, const vec4<float> &c, const vec4<float> &d = vec4<float>(0, 0, 0, 1))
1933 : a(a), b(b), c(c), d(d)
1934 {}
1935 matrix4(const matrix4x3 &m)
1936 : a(m.a, 0), b(m.b, 0), c(m.c, 0), d(m.d, 1)
1937 {}
1938 matrix4(const matrix3 &rot, const vec &trans)
1939 : a(rot.a, 0), b(rot.b, 0), c(rot.c, 0), d(trans, 1)
1940 {}
1941
1942 void mul(const matrix4 &x, const matrix3 &y)
1943 {
1944 a = vec4<float>(x.a).mul(y.a.x).madd(x.b, y.a.y).madd(x.c, y.a.z);
1945 b = vec4<float>(x.a).mul(y.b.x).madd(x.b, y.b.y).madd(x.c, y.b.z);
1946 c = vec4<float>(x.a).mul(y.c.x).madd(x.b, y.c.y).madd(x.c, y.c.z);
1947 d = x.d;
1948 }
1949 void mul(const matrix3 &y) { mul(matrix4(*this), y); }
1950
1951 template<class T>
1952 void mult(const matrix4 &x, const matrix4 &y)
1953 {
1954 a = T(x.a).mul(y.a.x).madd(x.b, y.a.y).madd(x.c, y.a.z).madd(x.d, y.a.w);
1955 b = T(x.a).mul(y.b.x).madd(x.b, y.b.y).madd(x.c, y.b.z).madd(x.d, y.b.w);
1956 c = T(x.a).mul(y.c.x).madd(x.b, y.c.y).madd(x.c, y.c.z).madd(x.d, y.c.w);
1957 d = T(x.a).mul(y.d.x).madd(x.b, y.d.y).madd(x.c, y.d.z).madd(x.d, y.d.w);
1958 }
1959
1960 void mul(const matrix4 &x, const matrix4 &y) { mult<vec4<float>>(x, y); }
1961 void mul(const matrix4 &y) { mult<vec4<float>>(matrix4(*this), y); }
1962
1963 void muld(const matrix4 &x, const matrix4 &y) { mult<vec4<float>>(x, y); }
1964 void muld(const matrix4 &y) { mult<vec4<float>>(matrix4(*this), y); }
1965
1966 void rotate_around_x(float ck, float sk)
1967 {
1968 vec4<float> rb = vec4<float>(b).mul(ck).madd(c, sk),
1969 rc = vec4<float>(c).mul(ck).msub(b, sk);
1970 b = rb;
1971 c = rc;
1972 }
1973 void rotate_around_x(float angle) { rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1974 void rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
1975
1976 void rotate_around_y(float ck, float sk)
1977 {
1978 vec4<float> rc = vec4<float>(c).mul(ck).madd(a, sk),
1979 ra = vec4<float>(a).mul(ck).msub(c, sk);
1980 c = rc;
1981 a = ra;
1982 }
1983 void rotate_around_y(float angle) { rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1984 void rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
1985
1986 void rotate_around_z(float ck, float sk)
1987 {
1988 vec4<float> ra = vec4<float>(a).mul(ck).madd(b, sk),
1989 rb = vec4<float>(b).mul(ck).msub(a, sk);
1990 a = ra;
1991 b = rb;
1992 }
1993 void rotate_around_z(float angle) { rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1994 void rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
1995
1996 void rotate(float ck, float sk, const vec &axis)
1997 {
1998 matrix3 m;
1999 m.rotate(ck, sk, axis);
2000 mul(m);
2001 }
2002 void rotate(float angle, const vec &dir) { rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), dir); }
2003 void rotate(const vec2 &sc, const vec &dir) { rotate(sc.x, sc.y, dir); }
2004
2005 void identity()
2006 {
2007 a = vec4<float>(1, 0, 0, 0);
2008 b = vec4<float>(0, 1, 0, 0);
2009 c = vec4<float>(0, 0, 1, 0);
2010 d = vec4<float>(0, 0, 0, 1);
2011 }

2013 void settranslation(const vec &v) { d.setxyz(v); }
2014 void settranslation(float x, float y, float z) { d.x = x; d.y = y; d.z = z; }
2015
2016 void translate(const vec &p) { d.madd(a, p.x).madd(b, p.y).madd(c, p.z); }
2017 void translate(float x, float y, float z) { translate(vec(x, y, z)); }
2018 void translate(const vec &p, float scale) { translate(vec(p).mul(scale)); }
2019
2020 void setscale(float x, float y, float z) { a.x = x; b.y = y; c.z = z; }
2021 void setscale(const vec &v) { setscale(v.x, v.y, v.z); }
2022 void setscale(float n) { setscale(n, n, n); }
2023
2024 void scale(float x, float y, float z)
2025 {
2026 a.mul(x);
2027 b.mul(y);
2028 c.mul(z);
2029 }
2030 void scale(const vec &v) { scale(v.x, v.y, v.z); }
2031 void scale(float n) { scale(n, n, n); }
2032
2033 void scalexy(float x, float y)
2034 {
2035 a.x *= x; a.y *= y;
2036 b.x *= x; b.y *= y;
2037 c.x *= x; c.y *= y;
2038 d.x *= x; d.y *= y;
2039 }
2040
2041 void scalez(float k)
2042 {
2043 a.z *= k;
2044 b.z *= k;
2045 c.z *= k;
2046 d.z *= k;
2047 }
2048
2049 void reflectz(float z)
2050 {
2051 d.add(vec4(c).mul(2*z));
2052 c.neg();
2053 }
2054
2055 void jitter(float x, float y)
2056 {
2057 a.x += x * a.w;
2058 a.y += y * a.w;
2059 b.x += x * b.w;
2060 b.y += y * b.w;
2061 c.x += x * c.w;
2062 c.y += y * c.w;
2063 d.x += x * d.w;
2064 d.y += y * d.w;
2065 }
2066
2067 void transpose()
2068 {
2069 swap(a.y, b.x); swap(a.z, c.x); swap(a.w, d.x);
2070 swap(b.z, c.y); swap(b.w, d.y);
2071 swap(c.w, d.z);
2072 }
2073
2074 void transpose(const matrix4 &m)
2075 {
2076 a = vec4<float>(m.a.x, m.b.x, m.c.x, m.d.x);
2077 b = vec4<float>(m.a.y, m.b.y, m.c.y, m.d.y);
2078 c = vec4<float>(m.a.z, m.b.z, m.c.z, m.d.z);
2079 d = vec4<float>(m.a.w, m.b.w, m.c.w, m.d.w);
2080 }
2081
2082 void frustum(float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float znear, float zfar)
2083 {
2084 float width = right - left,
2085 height = top - bottom,
2086 zrange = znear - zfar;
2087 a = vec4<float>(2*znear/width, 0, 0, 0);
2088 b = vec4<float>(0, 2*znear/height, 0, 0);
2089 c = vec4<float>((right + left)/width, (top + bottom)/height, (zfar + znear)/zrange, -1);
2090 d = vec4<float>(0, 0, 2*znear*zfar/zrange, 0);
2091 }
2092
2093 void perspective(float fovy, float aspect, float znear, float zfar)
2094 {
2095 float ydist = znear * std::tan(fovy/2*RAD),
2096 xdist = ydist * aspect;
2097 frustum(-xdist, xdist, -ydist, ydist, znear, zfar);
2098 }
2099
2100 void ortho(float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float znear, float zfar)
2101 {
2102 float width = right - left,
2103 height = top - bottom,
2104 zrange = znear - zfar;
2105 a = vec4<float>(2/width, 0, 0, 0);
2106 b = vec4<float>(0, 2/height, 0, 0);
2107 c = vec4<float>(0, 0, 2/zrange, 0);
2108 d = vec4<float>(-(right+left)/width, -(top+bottom)/height, (zfar+znear)/zrange, 1);
2109 }
2110
2111 void clip(const plane &p, const matrix4 &m)
2112 {
2113 float x = ((p.x<0 ? -1 : (p.x>0 ? 1 : 0)) + m.c.x) / m.a.x,
2114 y = ((p.y<0 ? -1 : (p.y>0 ? 1 : 0)) + m.c.y) / m.b.y,
2115 w = (1 + m.c.z) / m.d.z,
2116 scale = 2 / (x*p.x + y*p.y - p.z + w*p.offset);
2117 a = vec4<float>(m.a.x, m.a.y, p.x*scale, m.a.w);
2118 b = vec4<float>(m.b.x, m.b.y, p.y*scale, m.b.w);
2119 c = vec4<float>(m.c.x, m.c.y, p.z*scale + 1.0f, m.c.w);
2120 d = vec4<float>(m.d.x, m.d.y, p.offset*scale, m.d.w);
2121 }
2122
2123 void transform(const vec &in, vec &out) const
2124 {
2125 out = vec(a).mul(in.x).add(vec(b).mul(in.y)).add(vec(c).mul(in.z)).add(vec(d));
2126 }
2127
2128 void transform(const vec4<float> &in, vec &out) const
2129 {
2130 out = vec(a).mul(in.x).add(vec(b).mul(in.y)).add(vec(c).mul(in.z)).add(vec(d).mul(in.w));
2131 }
2132
2133 void transform(const vec &in, vec4<float> &out) const
2134 {
2135 out = vec4<float>(a).mul(in.x).madd(b, in.y).madd(c, in.z).add(d);
2136 }
2137
2138 void transform(const vec4<float> &in, vec4<float> &out) const
2139 {
2140 out = vec4<float>(a).mul(in.x).madd(b, in.y).madd(c, in.z).madd(d, in.w);
2141 }
2142
2143 template<class T, class U>
2144 T transform(const U &in) const
2145 {
2146 T v;
2147 transform(in, v);
2148 return v;
2149 }
2150
2151 template<class T>
2152 vec perspectivetransform(const T &in) const
2153 {
2154 vec4<float> v;
2155 transform(in, v);
2156 return vec(v).div(v.w);
2157 }
2158
2159 void transformnormal(const vec &in, vec &out) const
2160 {
2161 out = vec(a).mul(in.x).add(vec(b).mul(in.y)).add(vec(c).mul(in.z));
2162 }
2163
2164 void transformnormal(const vec &in, vec4<float> &out) const
2165 {
2166 out = vec4<float>(a).mul(in.x).madd(b, in.y).madd(c, in.z);
2167 }

2170 T transformnormal(const U &in) const
2171 {

2174 return v;

2177 void transposedtransform(const vec &in, vec &out) const
2178 {
2179 vec p = vec(in).sub(vec(d));
2180 out.x = a.dot3(p);
2181 out.y = b.dot3(p);
2182 out.z = c.dot3(p);
2183 }
2184
2185 void transposedtransformnormal(const vec &in, vec &out) const
2186 {
2187 out.x = a.dot3(in);
2188 out.y = b.dot3(in);
2189 out.z = c.dot3(in);
2190 }
2191
2192 void transposedtransform(const plane &in, plane &out) const
2193 {
2194 out.x = in.dist(a);
2195 out.y = in.dist(b);
2196 out.z = in.dist(c);
2197 out.offset = in.dist(d);
2198 }
2199
2200 float getscale() const
2201 {
2202 return sqrtf(a.x*a.y + b.x*b.x + c.x*c.x);
2203 }
2204
2205 vec gettranslation() const
2206 {
2207 return vec(d);
2208 }
2209
2210 vec4<float> rowx() const { return vec4<float>(a.x, b.x, c.x, d.x); }
2211 vec4<float> rowy() const { return vec4<float>(a.y, b.y, c.y, d.y); }
2212 vec4<float> rowz() const { return vec4<float>(a.z, b.z, c.z, d.z); }
2213 vec4<float> roww() const { return vec4<float>(a.w, b.w, c.w, d.w); }
2214
2215 bool invert(const matrix4 &m, double mindet = 1.0e-12);
2216
2217 vec2 lineardepthscale() const
2218 {
2219 return vec2(d.w, -d.z).div(c.z*d.w - d.z*c.w);
2220 }
2221};

2240
2244struct half
2245{
2246 ushort val;
2247
2248 half() {}
2249 half(float f) //truncates a 32 bit float to a 16 bit half
2250 {
2251 union
2252 {
2253 int i;
2254 float f;
2255 } conv;
2256 conv.f = f;
2257 ushort signbit = (conv.i>>(31-15)) & (1<<15),
2258 mantissa = (conv.i>>(23-10)) & 0x3FF;
2259 int exponent = ((conv.i>>23)&0xFF) - 127 + 15;
2260 if(exponent <= 0)
2261 {
2262 mantissa |= 0x400;
2263 mantissa >>= min(1-exponent, 10+1);
2264 exponent = 0;
2265 }
2266 else if(exponent >= 0x1F)
2267 {
2268 mantissa = 0;
2269 exponent = 0x1F;
2270 }
2271 val = signbit | (static_cast<ushort>(exponent)<<10) | mantissa;
2272 }
2273
2274 bool operator==(const half &h) const { return val == h.val; }
2275 bool operator!=(const half &h) const { return val != h.val; }
2276};
2277
2278//generic two dimensional vector
2279template<class T>
2280struct GenericVec2
2281{
2282 T x,y;
2283
2284 GenericVec2() {}
2285 GenericVec2(T x, T y) : x(x), y(y) {}
2286 GenericVec2(const vec2 &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
2287
2288 bool operator==(const GenericVec2 &h) const { return x == h.x && y == h.y; }
2289 bool operator!=(const GenericVec2 &h) const { return x != h.x || y != h.y; }
2290};
2291
2292//generic three dmensional vector
2293template<class T>
2294struct GenericVec3
2295{
2296 T x,y,z;
2297
2298 GenericVec3() {}
2299 GenericVec3(T x, T y, T z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
2300 GenericVec3(const vec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
2301
2302 GenericVec3<T> operator+(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return GenericVec3<T>(x+h.x, y+h.y,z+h.z); }
2303 GenericVec3<T> operator-(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return GenericVec3<T>(x-h.x, y-h.y, z-h.z); }
2304
2305 //comparison
2306 bool operator==(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x == h.x && y == h.y && z == h.z; }
2307 bool operator!=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x != h.x || y != h.y || z != h.z; }
2308 bool operator>(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x > h.x && y > h.y && z > h.z; }
2309 bool operator<(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x < h.x && y < h.y && z < h.z; }
2310 bool operator>=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x >= h.x && y >= h.y && z >= h.z; }
2311 bool operator<=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x <= h.x && y <= h.y && z <= h.z; }
2312};
2313
2314//short integer quaternion
2315struct squat
2316{
2317 short x, y, z, w;
2318
2319 squat() {}
2320 squat(const vec4<float> &q) { convert(q); }
2321
2322 void convert(const vec4<float> &q)
2323 {
2324 x = static_cast<short>(q.x*32767.5f-0.5f);
2325 y = static_cast<short>(q.y*32767.5f-0.5f);
2326 z = static_cast<short>(q.z*32767.5f-0.5f);
2327 w = static_cast<short>(q.w*32767.5f-0.5f);
2328 }
2329
2330 void lerp(const vec4<float> &a, const vec4<float> &b, float t)
2331 {
2332 vec4<float> q;
2333 q.lerp(a, b, t);
2334 convert(q);
2335 }
2336};

2343extern const vec2 sincos360[];
2344inline int mod360(int angle)
2345{
2346 if(angle < 0)
2347 {
2348 angle = 360 + (angle <= -360 ? angle%360 : angle);
2349 }
2350 else if(angle >= 360)
2351 {
2352 angle %= 360;
2353 }
2354 return angle;
2355}
2356inline const vec2 &sincosmod360(int angle) { return sincos360[mod360(angle)]; }
2357inline float cos360(int angle) { return sincos360[angle].x; }
2358inline float sin360(int angle) { return sincos360[angle].y; }
2359inline float tan360(int angle) { const vec2 &sc = sincos360[angle]; return sc.y/sc.x; }
2360inline float cotan360(int angle) { const vec2 &sc = sincos360[angle]; return sc.x/sc.y; }
